title: Exorcisms - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/26/22
itunes:title: Exorcisms - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/26/22
description:
George Noory and author Michael Lichens explore his research into the Catholic rite of exorcism to drive out demonic spirits, how demons pick a victim to possess, and if ouija boards are just a game or a portal to attract evil spirits.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
